channel.title: Record on Preslav Rachev
channel.description: Recent content in Record on Preslav Rachev

item.title: This Is How We Write History
item.description: This morning, a humble distance runner from Kenya once again proved that the impossible is only a state of mind. A performance, more resembling a concert symphony than an endurance race. Eliud Kipchoge broke the 2-hour marathon barrier today - something that for years was deemed unthinkable for any human being: This is the beginning of a new era of running. I am certain that Kipchoge’s achievement will inspire others, if not to try a and beat it, to at least get out and be active.
